description: information about the environmental conditions during the acquisition

averageAirTemperature.description: average air temperature along the flight pass during the photo flight

maxRelativeHumidity.description: maximum relative humidity along the flight pass during the photo flight

maxAltitude.description: maximum altitude during the photo flight

meteorologicalConditions.description: meteorological conditions in the photo flight area, in particular clouds, snow and wind

solarAzimuth.description: clockwise angle in degrees from north to the centre of the sun’s disc. Note: This angle is calculated from the nadir point of the sensor, not at the centre point of the image

solarElevation.description: angle between the horizon and the centre of the Sun’s disk
